name: "Bone Collector" M-65 Jacket
description:
In the concrete jungle it's necessary to blend in while still standing out. Our "Bone Collector" M-65 jacket is a Savage take on a classic fashion staple every man should have in his closet. Jacket features a concealed hood inside zipper area. Heavyweight 100% Cotton for cold weather. 10 oz weight. Great for layering. Zipper Fitted Cuffs with Velcro to adjust the fit around the wrists. Bone Collector logo printed below the front right pocket and centered on the back area. "19th Letter"  logo printed below left pocket. "City of Savages" logo printed on the inside of the jacket.

SIZING:Jackets run big so customers should order a size down from their usual size. (Ex. 5'10 160lb Male should order a size Small)

SHIPPING:Please allow 3 to 10 business days for product to be shipped.

name: City of Savages Tie Dye (Camo) Hoodie
description:
our o.g COS Logo has a new look this time around on our Tie Dye (Camo) Hoodie, the product also features a "S" in COS font centered on back shoulder area. 50/50 cotton/poly blend washable in cold water, wash inside out. (Color of hoodie may be slightly darker than product picture)

SIZING:Customers should order a size up from what they usually wear because this item is prewashed and there is some slight shrinkage.

SHIPPING:Please allow 3 to 10 business days for product to be shipped.

name: "Unseen Enemy" Hockey Jersey (Camo)
description:
The most dangerous enemy isn't the who's right in front of your eyes it's the one who you can't see. Product features our "19th Letter" logo on the left chest area and  Emperor scorpion on centered the back area.

Jersey features heavy weight AK knit material for warmth. Great for layering. 100% Polyester. Hand washing is suggested. If washed by machine wash separately on delicate cycle in cold water, inside out.

SIZING:Jerseys run big so customers should order a size down from their usual sweater/jersey size.

SHIPPING:Please allow 3 to 10 business days for product to be shipped.

name: "Radiant Child" Denim Shirt
description:
With inspiration from the late artist Jean-Michel Basquiat's  "Charles the 1st" painting (1982), we've found a way to combine the world's of fashion and art seamlessly with our "Radiant Child" Denim Shirt. Product features a letter "S" encased in a jagged upside down triangle and the golden crown are from the actual painting. The splattered paint on the bottom of the shirt makes it look as though a masterpiece was created while it was being worn.  

Wash inside out in cold water. 100% Cotton. Wash inside out in cold water using delicate cycle.

SHIPPING:Please allow 3 to 10 business days for product to be shipped

name: City of Savages "Ashes to Ashes" (Burnout) Hoodie
description:
our o.g COS logo has a new scorched look this time around with our "Ashes to Ashes" (Burnout) Hoodie. With the look as if it's been through Hell and back this product proves that when the smoke clears only the SAVAGES will survive. The hoodie also features a "S" in COS font centered on back shoulder area. Base color for hoodie is black, the (Burnout) effect gives the hoodie a grey/brown color in the lighter areas. 50/50 cotton/poly blend washable in cold water, wash inside out.

name: "Year of the Snake" Hoodie (Ash Grey/Black)
description:
2013 is the "Year of the Snake" according to the Chinese Zodiac and City of Savages is celebrating by releasing our "Year of the Snake" Hoodie. This product features the word "Savage" in our "Snake" font across the top chest area with our "Savage Viper" logo below it. The product also features the abbreviation for our brand "C.O.S" in our "Snake" font centered on the front pocket are. 50/50 cotton/poly blend washable in cold water, wash inside out.
